mapper.select: /* getTeamVersion */ SELECT PTV.*, DATE_FORMAT(PTV.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DATE FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_TEAM_VERSION PTV WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}

/* getTeamMngList */ SELECT A.PJT_SN AS PJT_SN, A.BUSN_CLASS AS BUSN_CLASS, A.BUSN_NM AS BUSN_NM, A.PJT_TMP_CD AS PJT_TMP_CD, A.PJT_NM AS PJT_NM, A.DELV_APPROVE_STAT AS STATUS, B.TEAM_VERSION_SN FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_TEAM_VERSION B LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT A ON A.PJT_SN = B.PJT_SN WHERE B.STATUS = '10'
mapper.insert:
/* setTeamAddVersion */ INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_TEAM_VERSION ( PJT_SN, REG_DT, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{pjtSn}, NOW(), #{regEmpSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_PJT_MNG' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_PJT_TEAM_VERSION'

/* setTeamDelv */ INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_TEAM ( TEAM_VERSION_SN, PJT_SN, TM_TYPE, TM_TEAM_SEQ, TM_PM_SEQ, TM_INV_AMT, REG_DT, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{teamVersionSn}, #{pjtSn}, #{tmType}, (SELECT HEI.DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO HEI WHERE HEI.EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq}), #{regEmpSeq}, 0, NOW(), #{regEmpSeq} )

/* insTeam */ INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_TEAM ( TEAM_VERSION_SN, PJT_SN, TM_TYPE, TM_TEAM_SEQ, TM_PM_SEQ, TM_AMT, TM_INV_AMT, REG_DT, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{teamVersionSn}, #{pjtSn}, #{tmType}, #{tmTeamSeq}, #{tmPMSeq}, #{teamAmt}, #{tmInvAmt}, NOW(), #{regEmpSeq} )
/* delTeam */ UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_TEAM SET WORK_TYPE = 'D', ACTIVE = 'N', MOD_DT = NOW(), MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq} WHERE TM_SN IN (${joinSn})

/* setTeamCopy */ INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_TEAM ( TEAM_VERSION_SN, PJT_SN, TM_TYPE, TM_TEAM_SEQ, TM_PM_SEQ, TM_AMT, TM_INV_AMT, REG_EMP_SEQ, WORK_TYPE ) SELECT #{teamVersionSn}, PJT_SN, TM_TYPE, TM_TEAM_SEQ, TM_PM_SEQ, TM_AMT, TM_INV_AMT, #{regEmpSeq}, 'U' FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_TEAM WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} AND TEAM_VERSION_SN = #{LAST_TEAM_VERSION_SN}

/* insTeamProject */ INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT ( EMP_SEQ, EMP_NAME, DEPT_SEQ, DEPT_NAME, BUSN_CLASS, BUSN_NM, TEAM_STAT, PNT_PJT_SN, SBJ_CLASS, SBJ_CHAR, SBJ_DEP, SBJ_DEP_SUB, SBJ_SEP, SBJ_STAT_YN, PJT_CON_YEAR, PJT_CD, PJT_TMP_CD, BS_TITLE, PJT_NM, PJT_STEP, PJT_STEP_NM, CRM_SN, CRM_MEM_SN, CRM_MEM_TEMP_NM, CRM_CON_SN, CRM_PART_SN, PM_EMP_SEQ, PM, PJT_AMT, PJT_EXP_AMT, CONSULT_DT, STR_DT, ACTIVE, REG_EMP_SEQ, TM_SN, REG_DT ) (SELECT #{TM_PM_SEQ} AS TM_PM_SEQ, IFNULL((SELECT EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{TM_PM_SEQ}), '') AS TM_EMP_NAME, #{TM_TEAM_SEQ}, IFNULL((SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = #{TM_TEAM_SEQ}), '') AS TM_TEAM_NAME, BUSN_CLASS, BUSN_NM, 'Y' AS TEAM_STAT, PJT_SN AS PNT_PJT_SN, SBJ_CLASS, SBJ_CHAR, SBJ_DEP, SBJ_DEP_SUB, SBJ_SEP, SBJ_STAT_YN, PJT_CON_YEAR, PJT_CD, PJT_TMP_CD, BS_TITLE, CONCAT("[협업] ", PJT_NM) AS PJT_NM, PJT_STEP, PJT_STEP_NM, CRM_SN, CRM_MEM_SN, CRM_MEM_TEMP_NM, CRM_CON_SN, CRM_PART_SN, #{TM_PM_SEQ} AS TM_PM_SEQ2, IFNULL((SELECT EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{TM_PM_SEQ}), '') AS TM_EMP_NAME2, #{TM_AMT}, #{TM_AMT}, CONSULT_DT, NOW(), ACTIVE, REG_EMP_SEQ, #{TM_SN}, REG_DT FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT WHERE PJT_SN = #{PJT_SN} AND TEAM_STAT = 'N')
mapper.update: /* updTeamProject */ UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT SET EMP_SEQ = #{TM_PM_SEQ}, EMP_NAME = IFNULL((SELECT EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{TM_PM_SEQ}), ''), DEPT_SEQ = #{TM_TEAM_SEQ}, DEPT_NAME = IFNULL((SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = #{TM_TEAM_SEQ}), ''), PM_EMP_SEQ = #{TM_PM_SEQ}, PM = IFNULL((SELECT EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{TM_PM_SEQ}), ''), PJT_AMT = #{TM_AMT}, PJT_EXP_AMT = #{TM_AMT} WHERE TM_SN = #{TM_SN}
